34 #include "calibration/camera_config.h"
35 
41 bool SetConfiguration(Camera* &camera)
42 {
43 
44  uint16_t roi_width;
45  uint16_t roi_height;
46  uint16_t roi_offset_x;
47  uint16_t roi_offset_y;
48 
49  // Error for checking if functions went okay
50  Error error;
51 
52  // Get Format7 information
53  Format7Info fmt7Info;
54  bool supported;
55  //fmt7Info.mode = fmt7Mode;
56  error = camera->GetFormat7Info(&fmt7Info, &supported);
57  if ( error != PGRERROR_OK )
58  {
59  cout << "Failed to get camera info from camera" << endl;
60  return false;
61  }
62 
63  // Make Format7 Configuration
64  Format7ImageSettings fmt7ImageSettings;
65  fmt7ImageSettings.mode = MODE_5;
66  fmt7ImageSettings.pixelFormat = PIXEL_FORMAT_MONO8;
67 
68  // Check Width
69  roi_width = 480; // Locks the width into an appropriate multiple using an integer divide
70 
71  fmt7ImageSettings.width = roi_width;
72 
73 
74  // Check Height
75  roi_height = 270; // Locks the height into an appropriate multiple using an integer divide
76 
77  fmt7ImageSettings.height = roi_height;
78 
79 
80  // Check OffsetX
81  roi_offset_x = 0; // Locks the X offset into an appropriate multiple using an integer divide
82 
83  fmt7ImageSettings.offsetX = roi_offset_x;
84 
85  // Check OffsetY
86  roi_offset_y = 46; // Locks the X offset into an appropriate multiple using an integer divide
87 
88  fmt7ImageSettings.offsetY = roi_offset_y;
89 
90  // Validate the settings to make sure that they are valid
91  Format7PacketInfo fmt7PacketInfo;
92  bool valid;
93  error = camera->ValidateFormat7Settings(&fmt7ImageSettings, &valid, &fmt7PacketInfo);
94  if ( error != PGRERROR_OK )
95  {
96  cout << "Failed to validate format" << endl;
97  return false;
98  }
99 
100  // Stop the camera to allow settings to change.
101  error = camera->SetFormat7Configuration(&fmt7ImageSettings, fmt7PacketInfo.recommendedBytesPerPacket);
102  if ( error != PGRERROR_OK )
103  {
104  cout << "Failed to set format" << endl;
105  error.PrintErrorTrace();
106  return false;
107  }
108 
109  // Get camera info to check if camera is running in color or mono mode
110  CameraInfo cInfo;
111  error = camera->GetCameraInfo(&cInfo);
112  if ( error != PGRERROR_OK )
113  {
114  cout << "Failed to get camera info2 from camera" << endl;
115  return false;
116  }
117 
118 
119 }

SetConfiguration
